ATTN Musicians: VC-Backed Music Startup Hiring Founding Team Back End Eng
text:
Hey HN,

I'm Steven Segel, Founder of HotDrop.

Over 90% of songs on streaming services don't have a single play ... HotDrop connects the massive number of unheard artists to an audience of musical early-adopters.

Our team at HotDrop is VC-backed and re-inventing the playlist as a better way to find new music by connecting the massive number of unheard artists to an audience of musical early-adopters.

--

We're hiring a founding team backend engineer who will own the development of our scalable backend supporting state of the art technologies with autonomy.

As founding engineer, you will shape the future of our company, and build the culture and technology from the ground up.

What we look for: In a sentence: Technically brilliant, delightful to work with, combined with a strong desire to win.

If this sounds interesting, please reach out to me at steven [at] hotdropapp [dot] com with “HN” in the subject line and 2-3 sentences about what you find interesting about HotDrop and your resume/LinkedIn/GitHub.
